question: Question regarding Qurbaani.
answer:
QUESTION
After slaughtering an animal, some people bend the head of the animal backwards, so as to break a few bones on the neck. The entire head is not removed from the body. This is said to cause the animal to die quicker. Is it permissible to do this?
ANSWER


Share:
This is not permissible. As long as life still remains, no bones may be broken.

The most humane method of slaughter, causing the least possible pain, is the
method of the Sunnah, i.e. slaughtering on the neck and leaving the animal
to die without any further pain.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Moulana Imraan Vawda
FATWA DEPT.
